name: Holiday Diamond Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect stay, awesome breakfast as you can choose as many items as you want from the menu, which is baked on the spot for you.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic service from all the staff who are very friendly and will figure out a way to help you with anything.
reviews.title: 3 Nights of Bliss

reviews.text: Beds are or seem new, fresh, 180cm wide and the rooms are spotless.
reviews.title: 6 Star
Fantastic - stay here!!
reviews.text: Price wise, a very good deal indeed.

We arrived very late and we were greeted by friendly staff who couldn't do enough to help and provided drinks and a snack at 12.30 am. The care and service were better than most international hotels and assistance with onward bookings and car arrangments was invaluable. Caroline, Jennifer, Amy and Kevin are a credit to the hotel and it deserves much success. Breakfasts are terrific and big thanks to the kitchen staff whose names I never knew. You must stay there!!
reviews.title: Service, Service and more service- with a smile!

reviews.text: The extraordinary kindness, friendliness and good humor of staff at this hotel are unparalleled in my experience. When its guests were reluctant to leave the hotel because of the typhoon, they arranged to have an excellent local restaurant deliver food to us. It is hard to imagine better value.
reviews.title: Lives up to its reputation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Never been served like in this hotel! The Staff makes this Hotel a very special one and they made our stay here a memorable one. The rooms could do with a bit of updating but nothing essential as they are pretty comfortable and super clean. No need to say more.
reviews.title: The Staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Holiday Diamond hotel for a few days, and I must say the the hotel is among the very best I've stayed at in Asia. The staff was extremely kind, and helpful. We were greeted with fresh fruit and juice on arrival. Everybody knew us by our names, which made us feel at home. The rooms were very clean and included many little details, including a lap top computer! First time I've seen that anywhere. :) The breakfast was very good too. A great experience!
reviews.title: Best hotel in Hue!!!! Amazing experience! Great staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was excellent value for money. We caught the airport shuttle bus for 50 000 Dong each and were dropped on the main street adjacent to the hotel. ( Hotel is a short distance down an alley.) The staff that greeted us were extremely friendly and helpful. We were given a cool drink and fruit on arrival. The room was clean and tidy and the breakfast was a set menu choice plus a small buffet of toast and fruits. Location was a close walk to the river and markets with restaurants only a street or two away. We found the hotel to be quiet and all staff to be friendly with good english spoken, we would stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: Only had one day in Hue. Staff were excellent and helped us maximize our short stay. Banana pancakes for breakfast - included - check! Room was small, but clean and adequate. You will have a giggle when you take a trip in the elevator!
reviews.title: Beautiful, friendly staff.

reviews.text: Room on upper floor was quiet, light with nice view. Free coffee, lime juice and ginger teas all day. My husband had his birthday and staff brought cake and flowers. Lovely boutique hotel, nice family feel.
reviews.title: Staff could not have done more to make our stay more enjoyable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What service! I'd recommend this hotel to anyone!
reviews.title: Better than 5 star service

reviews.text: Listed are a few positives:
reviews.title: fam van dorp

reviews.text: - Welcome towel in lobby
reviews.title: Oasis in Hue

reviews.text: - Welcome fruit in lobby
reviews.title: Great welcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right from the beginning when you step in the door we felt very welcomed. Everyone is extremely friendly and know their guest by name! Coffee, tea and juice and fruits were offered complimentary. Rooms are great, even had a laptop in our room. Bathroom very clean and interior of the room nice and cozy. Good place to stay a couple of nights. Location is just around the corner of cafes, restaurants and bars but in a quiet side alley. Perfect!
reviews.title: Excellent service, friendly staff and quiet rooms
Amazing Hospitality
reviews.text: Stayed one night at Hue Holiday Diamond Hotel and one night at the sister hotel down the street Serene Palace (same owner). 5* all the way around. Very clean room, amazing staff--very friendly, warm, and welcoming. We were in Hue on our honeymoon and they made it a honeymoon experience to remember.
Wifi available downstairs, breakfast included. Very centrally located as far as dining in Hue for westerners.
reviews.title: Superb value with outstanding service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you so much!
reviews.title: A gem in the city !
Great hotel!
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here recently for two nights and enjoyed Holiday Diamond Hotel and Hue so much that we wanted to stay longer.

description: Holiday Diamond Hotel in Hue city center in small lane.it is very quiet and only 10 minute by walking to Perfumer river
